name: WP Dark Emoticons Comment Smiley
author: Aditya Subawa

sections.description:
This plugin will display a dark emoticons smiley icon in wordpress comment system.by replacing the familiar string such as :),: (,:p,:D etc. and word filtering.

No configuration at all. to add the word filtering, you must manually edit the emoticons.php tag / * WORD FILTER * /.

Arbitrary section

Refer Installation and FAQ section for all required information

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. Most simple plugin available so far
  2. Adds Emoticon Smiley to wordpress comment system
  3. No configuration required at all
  4. Words Filtering
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload wp-darkemoticons.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory. You can do this using ‘Upload’ functionality provided in plugins section of your wordpress dashboard
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You are done.
sections.faq:
How to add more emoticons?

As of now, adding another emoticons is done by editing the .php file of the plugin. drawing and naming the file should be adjusted.

How to add more word filtering?

to add the word filtering, you must manually edit the emoticons.php tag / * WORD FILTER * /.
sections.changelog:
1.0

Upgrade Notice to 1.1

1.1

Plug-in is now compatible upto wordpress version 3.4
